modlAMP.delta_db package¶

Submodules¶

modlAMP.delta_db.connect_db module¶

Warning

The delta_db module is used to connect to the internal modlab peptide database on the delta641 machine. This connection is only possible in the modlab intranet. On the delta machine, all mysql-tables containing sequences must be included in the peptides database and having sequences stored in a column called sequence.

modlAMP.delta_db.connect_db.connect()[source]¶

Connect to a given MySQL database (in config.ini file). This function is called by the function query_sequences().

Returns:a mysql.connector connection object
Example: 
>>> conn = connect()
>>> conn
<mysql.connector.connection.MySQLConnection at 0x105ec6650>
modlAMP.delta_db.connect_db.read_db_config()[source]¶

Read database configuration and return a dictionary object. This function generally does not need to be used as it is called by the function query_sequences() directly.

Returns:a dictionary of database parameters

modlAMP.delta_db.query_db module¶

modlAMP.delta_db.query_db.query_sequences(table='ACP_annotation')[source]¶

This function extracts all sequences stored in a table column “sequence” and returns them as a list.

Parameters:table – the mysql database table to be queried
Returns:a list of sequences as strings
Example: 
>>> query_sequences(table='modlab_peptides')
Connecting to MySQL database...
connection established!
['YGGFL','WGKFFAGVKKLTKAILGEIA','WGKFFAGVKKLTKAILGEIA',....]
